Control Name: CA-3 (2) CLASSIFIED NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
Control Statement: The organization prohibits the direct connection of a classified, national security system to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].
